Selling the best trailers to our customers is just the start of a lifelong relationship. We want to ensure our customers continue to receive top-notch performance from their trailers. Along with our sales, and parts, North Texas Trailers is your one-stop-shop for trailer maintenance, repairs, and customizations. We Sell the Best and Service the Rest How to Keep Your Trailer in Peak Condition Whether you own a dump trailer, a car hauler, a cargo trailer, or any other trailer type, your equipment is an investment. Just like your car, your trailer needs regular maintenance and servicing to keep it in great working condition. Along with proper maintenance, using experienced technicians to perform quality repairs is essential to keeping your trailer on the road for years to come. What Is the Best Maintenance Schedule for Your Trailer? Safe trailer towing is more than just properly loading and hauling; it also includes performing regular maintenance on your trailer. Before Towing Your Trailer It is important to inspect and service your trailer before hitting the road. We recommend that your pre-trip checklist include checking: Brakes - Including Breakaway Brakes, Electric Brakes, and Surge Brakes Breakaway Battery Shoes & Drums Safety Chains & Hooks Coupler & Hitch Ball Ring & Pintle Tires Wheels Trailer Monthly Maintenance Monthly Inspection and Servicing Should Include: Lubrication (if applicable) - Including Gate & Door Hinges Trailer Six Month Maintenance Every six-month inspection and servicing should check for wear and damage in the following areas: Electric Brakes Surge Brakes Tires Brakes Shoes & Drums Safety Chains & Hooks Coupler & Hitch Ball Ring & Pintle Wheel Bearings Annual Trailer Maintenance Every year, as a trailer owner, you should check: Brake Shoes & Drums (All Types) Frame Members, Bolts, & Rivets Structure Welds Wheel Bearings Wheel Rims Axle Attachment Bolts Brake Wiring Jack, Drop-Leg (if applicable) Along with self-inspection, your trailer should be professionally inspected annually. Our staff at North Texas Trailers expertly inspects trailers to ensure all equipment is in proper shape. If your trailer needs repairs, our repair shop can do everything from basic repairs to fixing issues other dealers walk away from! Schedule Trailer Service at a North Texas Trailers Location Near You Trailer Maintenance and Repair Services at our Lewisville, McKinney, and Fort Worth shops include: Scheduled Maintenance Trailer Inspections Parts & Accessories Installation Tire Mount/Balance and Installation With three convenient locations to serve the Dallas-Fort Worth area, you don't have to worry about taking your trailer too far. Custom Trailer Solutions From North Texas Trailers If you're looking for a trailer to meet specialized requirements, we offer custom trailer options for customers all across the United States. Our highly skilled staff will help you determine your trailer needs. North Texas Trailers will either alter and customize one of our current trailers in stock or quote you for a completely unique build. Either way, your new trailer will meet your specifications. Our custom trailers deliver both performance and style for all trailer types and trailer manufacturers, including Wells Cargo, PJ Trailers, and Maxx'd. What Types of Trailers Do We Customize? Focusing on providing custom solutions to our customers, North Texas Trailers' customization abilities are endless. We've designed and built various custom trailers, from mobile command centers for local municipalities to specialized trailers that transport high-value equipment for the private sector. We are the experts in customizations! Why Choose North Texas Trailers for Repairs, Maintenance, and Customization? At North Texas Trailers, we understand the importance of choosing the best trailer shop for your maintenance, repairs, and custom trailers. We are the industry leader in Lewisville, McKinney, Fort Worth, and the surrounding areas for trailer servicing due to our commitment to best-in-class customer service, expert staff, and quality parts. Our customers are our highest priority. Once youâ€™re a customer, we want to keep you as a customer â€“ and as a friend â€“ for life!
